frame_title:
One eSIM for all
your trips
frame_check_title: Pay only for what you spend
connection_wait_message:
The connection process may
take from 1 minute to an hour.
connection_retry_instruction:
In case of connection problems –
turn on "Airplane Mode ✈" for 10 seconds and
try again.
fast_description_step1: Press "Install" and allow access to profiles on your device
fast_description_step2: Select "Primary" for default number and for "iMessage and FaceTime"
fast_description_step3: Select the recently added eSIM plan for cellular data
fast_description_step4:
Go to Settings > Cellular > Flex eSIM.

Enable "Data Roaming"
esim_description1: eSIM is a built-in SIM card that doesn't need to be inserted manually. Simply select a plan in the app, follow the instructions and activate the eSIM through your phone settings.
esim_description2: After activation, you immediately get access to the mobile network. To use the internet abroad – just top up your balance, and the connection will work in most countries without additional settings.
qr_code_description: Send QR code to another device
another_device_description_warning:
The actions described below need to be
performed on the device where you
want to activate the Flex eSIM plan
another_device_description1: On another device, open Settings > Cellular > Add eSIM > By QR Code
another_device_description2: Scan the QR code with another device
another_device_description3: Set a label for the new plan "Flex Plan"
another_device_description5: Select the recently added Flex eSIM plan for cellular data
another_device_description_important:
If you don't want to use eSIM right now, go to Settings > Cellular > Cellular Data and select Primary number.

Later, when you want to use Flex eSIM again – select it on this screen.
manual_description1: Go to Settings > Cellular > Flex eSIM. Install the plan by entering the "SM-DP+ Address" and "Activation Code".
balance_and_esim_activation: Top up your balance in the app and activate the eSIM card
profile_setup_guide: Set up your profile in your phone settings
ready_to_travel_message: Ready! Travel without worrying about your internet!
mobile_num_whats_app_description:
Enter the phone number
associated with WhatsApp
email_description:
Enter your email - we will send you a code for
authorization
now_you_need_to_install_esim:
Now you need to install eSIM
on your device.
you_can_activate_esim_only_once:
You can activate eSIM
only once on one device.
manage_more_esims:
You can manage multiple
eSIMs on your device
enter_amount_description:
Enter amount to connect
Flex Travel eSIM
auto_top_up_description:
Balance will be topped up automatically
by $15 so you don't lose access during
travel
code_sent_message: We sent a message with code to the number
enter_code_below: Enter code in the field below
code_sent_to_number: We sent a message with code to the number
